history.content:
Are you interested in tutoring students? Managing a large-scale program? Or are you proficient in Web Development and are looking for Software Engineering experience? Then, Engineering Mentors is the right program for you! 

Engineering Mentors is a mentorship program that the ASUC Office of Senator Sensurucu is creating for underserved engineering courses, including Physics 7A, Physics 7B, Engineering 7, and Engineering 26. 

We are looking for students interested in helping us manage this new program (Course Management Team), create educational materials (Course Content Team), and help us develop our technology suite (Technical/Engineering Team). More information about the teams can be found on our application. 

If you are interested in any of our positions, please fill out our short application! The application is due on April 22nd. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out to our office, Amol Budhiraja (abudhiraja@berkeley.edu), or Aarthi Kannan (aarthikannan@berkeley.edu)!
history.subject: Software Engineering, Management, and Tutoring Opportunity!
